summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Area Partnership to End and Prevent Homelessness Local Government Corporation (DAP) and the Citizen Homelessness Commission (CHC) will hold a joint meeting on February 1, 2024, from 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM at Dallas City Hall. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss strategies and recommendations aimed at improving the oversight of homelessness initiatives in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order and Roll Call  
2. Public Comment Session  
3. Discussion on the Hope Report Recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees.

**Important Details**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be on the Hope Report, which suggests the removal of overlapping oversight committees to streamline efforts in addressing homelessness. This recommendation aims to enhance the efficiency of the DAP and CHC in their mission to tackle homelessness in the community.

**Action Items**:  
The meeting will seek to gather input from the public and ultimately decide on the recommendation to eliminate duplicative oversight committees. This decision is crucial for refining the operational framework of the organizations involved in homelessness prevention and support in Dallas. Public participation is encouraged, with a limit of two minutes per speaker during the comment period.
